alert.note: Alert for Brantley (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 8:06PM EST until February 27 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Satilla River At Atkinson affecting Brantley County. Additional information is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/forecasts.php?wfo=jax. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Satilla River At Atkinson. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Warners Landing, Louis Landing and secondary roads around KOA campgrounds begin to flood. At 14.0 feet, River Rock Road begins to experience flooding across the road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM EST Saturday the stage was 13.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM EST Saturday was 14.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon and continue falling to 12.7 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
